achivements.001: Won 100 or more duels in total.
achivements.002: Won 10 or more duels against all duelable characters
achivements.003: Won 10 coin tosses in a row.
achivements.004: Caused 10,000 or more points of battle damage during a duel.
achivements.005: Caused 4,000 or more points of deflected battle damage during a duel.
achivements.006: Caused 20,000 or more points direct damage during a duel.
achivements.007: Caused 50,000 or more points of damage during a duel.
achivements.008: Destroyed 20 of your opponent’s monsters in battle during a duel.
achivements.009: Destroyed 30 of your opponent's monsters using effects during a duel.
achivements.010: Removed 10 of your opponent’s monsters from play using effects during a duel.
achivements.011: Normal Summoned 10 monsters during a duel.
achivements.012: Performed 10 Flip Summons during a duel.
achivements.013: Performed 10 Fusion Summons during a duel.
achivements.014: Performed 10 Ritual Summons during a duel.
achivements.015: Performed 10 Special Summons during a duel.[note 1]
achivements.016: Special Summoned 10 times from the Graveyard during a duel.[note 2]
achivements.017: Special Summoned 15 Tokens during a duel.
achivements.018: Equipped 5 Union monsters during a duel.
achivements.019: Caused 8,000 or more points of direct damage with Toon monsters during a duel.
achivements.020: Used Spell Cards 20 times during a duel.
achivements.021: Used Quick-Play Spell Cards 10 times in your opponent's turn in a duel.
achivements.022: Activated 10 Trap cards during a duel.
achivements.023: Countered your opponent's Spells, Traps, effects, Attacks and Summons 10 times during a duel.
achivements.024: Took control of your opponent's monsters 10 times during a duel.
achivements.025: Formed a chain of 5 chain links during a duel.
achivements.026: Used 10 Spell Counters during a duel.
achivements.027: Made your opponent discard 20 cards from his/her hand.
achivements.028: Restored 20,000 or more Life Points during a duel.
achivements.030: Ended the duel in a draw.
achivements.031: Won the duel without taking any damage.
achivements.032: Caused 8,000 points or more of damage during a turn and won the duel.
achivements.033: Caused 8,000 points or more of damage with a single attack or effect and won the duel.
achivements.034: Made your opponent run out of cards and won the duel.
achivements.039: Won the duel using the effects of “Exodia the Forbidden One”.
achivements.040: Won the duel using the effects of “Destiny Board”.
achivements.041: Won the duel using the effects of “Final Countdown”.
achivements.042: Won using a card with a match-winning effect.
achivements.044: Summoned every card in the XYZ Series and won the duel.
achivements.045: Successfully Summoned “VWXYZ-Dragon Catapult Cannon” and won the duel.
achivements.046: Successfully Summoned “Uria, Lord of Searing Flames” and won the duel.
achivements.047: Successfully Summoned “Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder” and won the duel.
achivements.048: Successfully Summoned “Raviel, Lord of Phantasms” and won the duel.
achivements.049: Summoned all the Sacred Beast Cards and won the duel.
achivements.050: Successfully activated and maintained the effect of "Ojama Delta Hurricane!!" and won the duel.
achivements.051: Successfully activated and maintained the effect of “Huge Revolution” and won the duel.
achivements.052: Successfully Summoned “Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth” and won the duel.
achivements.053: Successfully Summoned “Gate Guardian” and won the duel.
achivements.054: Successfully Summoned “Valkyrion the Magna Warrior” and won the duel.
achivements.055: Successfully Summoned “Dark Sage” and won the duel.
achivements.056: Successfully activated and maintained the effect of "Dark Scorpion Combination" and won the duel.
achivements.057: Used "Dark Scorpion Retreat" and won the Duel.
achivements.058: Defeated your opponent with an attack from "Skull Servant”.
achivements.059: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any Flip Effect monsters.
achivements.060: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters Level 4 or lower.
achivements.061: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters Level 5 or higher.
achivements.062: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters Level 2 or higher.
achivements.063: Won with a deck that contained monsters of every Level.
achivements.064: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters with an ATK of 1500 or less.
achivements.065: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters with an ATK of 1500 or more.
achivements.066: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters with an ATK of 1 or more.
achivements.067: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except LIGHT monsters.
achivements.068: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except DARK monsters.
achivements.069: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except WATER monsters.
achivements.070: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except FIRE monsters.
achivements.071: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except EARTH monsters.
achivements.072: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except WIND monsters.
achivements.073: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Dragon-Type monsters.
achivements.074: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Zombie-Type monsters.
achivements.075: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Fiend-Type monsters.
achivements.076: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Pyro-Type monsters.
achivements.077: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Sea Serpent-Type monsters.
achivements.078: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Rock-Type monsters.
achivements.079: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Machine-Type monsters.
achivements.080: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Fish-Type monsters.
achivements.081: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Dinosaur-Type monsters.
achivements.082: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Insect-Type monsters.
achivements.083: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Beast-Type monsters.
achivements.084: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Beast-Warrior-Type monsters.
achivements.085: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Plant-Type monsters.
achivements.086: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Aqua-Type monsters.
achivements.087: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Warrior-Type monsters.
achivements.088: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Winged Beast-Type monsters.
achivements.089: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Fairy-Type monsters.
achivements.090: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Spellcaster-Type monsters.
achivements.091: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Thunder-Type monsters.
achivements.092: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Reptile-Type monsters.
achivements.093: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except ones whose names contain “LV”.
achivements.094: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except ones whose names begin with “Elemental Hero”.
achivements.095: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Spirit monsters.
achivements.096: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters except Toon monsters.
achivements.097: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters (not including Fusion Deck).
achivements.098: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any monsters (including Fusion Deck).
achivements.099: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any Trap Cards.
achivements.100: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any Spell Cards.
achivements.101: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any Spell or Trap Cards.
achivements.102: Won with a Deck that had 80 cards in it.
achivements.103: Won with a Deck that didn’t contain any Forbidden, Limited, or Semi-Limited Cards.
achivements.104: Won with a Deck that only contained one copy of each card.
achivements.106: Won without performing a Special Summon.
achivements.107: Won without performing a Normal Summon.
achivements.108: Made all the characters appear in the database.
achivements.111: Cleared Story mode for all main characters.
achivements.112: Clear story mode with ALL characters.

bonus.name: Clear Bonus
bonus.desc: Clear Bonus (# times you finish part 3)

bonus.name: Level Bonus
bonus.desc: Level Bonus - Automatic

bonus.name: Challenge Bonus
bonus.desc: Challenge Bonus

bonus.name: Lose
bonus.desc: Lose - Lose a duel

bonus.name: Draw Game Bonus
bonus.desc: Draw Game Bonus - End the duel in a draw

bonus.name: Turn Bonus
bonus.desc: Turn Bonus - Automatic
bonus.reward: 2DP/turn (1 DP/turn if you lose a duel in a Match or if you get a draw in any duel)

bonus.name: Tag Duel Victory Bonus
bonus.desc: Tag Duel Victory Bonus - Play a tag duel and win

bonus.name: Network Duel Victory Bonus
bonus.desc: Network Duel Victory Bonus - Duel against another person

bonus.name: Match Game Bonus
bonus.desc: Match Game Bonus - Play and win a match game

bonus.name: Level Up Bonus
bonus.desc: Level Up Bonus - Given when you level up

bonus.name: Duelist Bonus
bonus.desc: Duelist Bonus - Automatic upon win, amount depending on opponent

bonus.name: No More Cards Bonus
bonus.desc: No More Cards Bonus - Win when opponent must draw but has no more cards

bonus.name: Quick Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Quick Finish Bonus - Win within 5 Turns

bonus.name: Reversal Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Reversal Finish Bonus - Win within a turn where you started with lower LP

bonus.name: Opponent's Turn Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Opponent's Turn Finish Bonus - Win during opponent's turn

bonus.name: Partner Victory Bonus
bonus.desc: Partner Victory Bonus - Win during your partner's turn in a tag duel

bonus.name: Low LP Bonus
bonus.desc: Low LP Bonus - Win when your LP is below 1000

bonus.name: Extremely Low LP Bonus
bonus.desc: Extremely Low LP Bonus - Win when your LP is below 100

bonus.name: LP Keep Bonus
bonus.desc: LP Keep Bonus - Win without taking any damage

bonus.name: Over 20,000 LP Bonus
bonus.desc: Over 20,000 LP Bonus - Win with LP over 20,000

bonus.name: Konami Bonus
bonus.desc: Konami Bonus - Win having 5730 LP

bonus.name: Low Deck Bonus
bonus.desc: Low Deck Bonus - Win with less than 10 cards left in the deck

bonus.name: Extremely Low Deck Bonus
bonus.desc: Extremely Low Deck Bonus - Win with no more cards in the deck

bonus.name: Spell Card Bonus
bonus.desc: Spell Card Bonus - Win with more than 10 spells used

bonus.name: Trap Card Bonus
bonus.desc: Trap Card Bonus - Win with more than 10 traps used

bonus.name: No Spell Cards Bonus
bonus.desc: No Spell Cards Bonus - Win without activating a single spell

bonus.name: No Trap Cards Bonus
bonus.desc: No Trap Cards Bonus - Win without activating a single trap

bonus.name: Fusion Summon Bonus
bonus.desc: Fusion Summon Bonus - Perform a fusion summon

bonus.name: Ritual Summon Bonus
bonus.desc: Ritual Summon Bonus - Perform a ritual summon

bonus.name: Tribute Summon Bonus
bonus.desc: Tribute Summon Bonus - Perform a tribute summon

bonus.name: No Special Summon Bonus
bonus.desc: No Special Summon Bonus - Win without performing any special summon

bonus.name: Chain Bonus
bonus.desc: Chain Bonus - Perform a chain of Chain Level 3 or 4

bonus.name: Max ATK Bonus
bonus.desc: Max ATK Bonus - Have a monster with ATK 2500 or more

bonus.name: Max Damage Bonus
bonus.desc: Max Damage Bonus - Inflict a 2500 or more damage to your opponent with a single monster

bonus.name: LP Differential Bonus
bonus.desc: LP Differential Bonus - No idea how this is calculated yet

bonus.name: Max Reflected Damage Bonus
bonus.desc: Max Reflected Damage Bonus - Make your opponent damage when he/she attacks (Higher ATK/DEF)

bonus.name: Exactly 0 LP Bonus
bonus.desc: Exactly 0 LP Bonus - Win by inflicting damage equal to opponent's remaining LP

bonus.name: Battle Damage only Bonus
bonus.desc: Battle Damage only Bonus - Win without inflicting effect damage

bonus.name: Effect Damage only Bonus
bonus.desc: Effect Damage only Bonus - Win without inflicting battle damage

bonus.name: Destroy in Battle Bonus
bonus.desc: Destroy in Battle Bonus - Destroy 10 cards through battle

bonus.name: Destroy by Effect Bonus
bonus.desc: Destroy by Effect Bonus - Destroy 10 cards through effects

bonus.name: Removed from Play Bonus
bonus.desc: Removed from Play Bonus - Remove 10 opponent's cards from play

bonus.name: Hand Destruction Bonus
bonus.desc: Hand Destruction Bonus - Discard 10 opponent's cards from hand

bonus.name: Deck Destruction Bonus
bonus.desc: Deck Destruction Bonus - Discard 10 opponent's cards from deck

bonus.name: Return to Hand Bonus
bonus.desc: Return to Hand Bonus - Retrieve 10 cards from field or graveyard

bonus.name: Luck Bonus
bonus.desc: Luck Bonus - Win coin toss or dice rolls consecutively

bonus.name: Counter Bonus
bonus.desc: Counter Bonus - Use counter traps

bonus.name: Union Bonus
bonus.desc: Union Bonus - Perform a union

bonus.name: Same Card Bonus
bonus.desc: Same Card Bonus - Having 2 or 3 of the same cards on your field

bonus.name: All Monster Card Zone Bonus
bonus.desc: All Monster Card Zone Bonus - Occupy all your monster slots on the field

bonus.name: No Monster Card Zone Bonus
bonus.desc: No Monster Card Zone Bonus - Block all 5 of your opponent's zones (Ojama King, Ground Collapse)

bonus.name: Key card destruction Bonus
bonus.desc: Key card destruction Bonus - Destroy or remove the main cards of your opponent (You'll know when it is a Key Card when he/she gasps)

bonus.name: Exodia Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Exodia Finish Bonus - Won by the effect of "Exodia the Forbidden One"

bonus.name: Destiny Board Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Destiny Board Finish Bonus - Won by the effect of "Destiny Board"

bonus.name: Final Countdown Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Final Countdown Finish Bonus - Won by the effect of "Final Countdown"

bonus.name: Last Turn Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Last Turn Finish Bonus - Won by the effect of "Last Turn"

bonus.name: Skull Servant Finish Bonus
bonus.desc: Skull Servant Finish Bonus - Won by an attack from "Skull Servant"

bonus.name: New Bonus
bonus.desc: New Bonus

score.012: Number of opponent's monsters destroyed in battle
score.013: Number of opponent's monsters destroyed by effects
score.014: Number of opponent's monsters removed from play by effects
score.027: Number of times countered opponent's move
score.028: Number of times controlled opponent's monsters
score.029: Direct damage caused with Toon monsters
score.030: Number of coin tosses won in a row
score.032: Number of cards removed from play
score.033: Number of cards discarded from hand
score.034: Number of opponents cards removed from Deck
score.035: Number of cards returned to hand
